title: Edge’s prospective free VPN would be a tempting reason to ditch Chrome
content:
I’m one of countless people who are foolishly faithful to Chrome. Despite the browser’s horrible rep for privacy, memory-hogging, battery-draining, and role in Google’s monopoly, I can’t call it quits. We had too many good times together — and the old bastard is still pretty. Our relationship, however, may soon face a new threat. According to a page on the Microsoft website that was spotted by Neowin, the software giant has developed a built-in VPN for the Edge browser. description: Microsoft may soon release a free, built-in VPN for the Edge browser. It could be the breaking point of my relationship with Chrome.
